code: import React from'react';import{projects}from"../data";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Projects(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"projects",className:"text-gray-400 bg-gray-900 body-font",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container px-5 py-10 mx-auto text-center lg:px-40",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col w-full mb-20",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"sm:text-4xl text-3xl font-medium title-font mb-4 text-white",children:"Apps I've built"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"lg:w-2/3 mx-auto leading-relaxed text-base",children:"Hover for the deets"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap -m-4 items-center",children:projects.map(function(project){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:project.deployedURL,className:"sm:w-1/2 w-100 p-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex relative",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"gallery",className:"absolute inset-0 w-full h-full object-cover object-center",src:project.image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"px-8 py-10 relative z-10 w-full border-4 border-gray-800 bg-gray-900 opacity-0 hover:opacity-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"tracking-widest text-sm title-font font-medium text-blue-400 mb-1",children:[" ",project.subtitle]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title-font text-lg font-medium text-white mb-3",children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"leading-relaxed",children:project.description})]})]})},project.image);})})]})});}
